\begin{tcAthena}
conclude (forall n m . m = Succ n ==> m * (1 + n) = m * m)
  pick-any n:Nat m:Nat
    assume hyp := (m = Succ n)
      (!chain [(m * (1 + n))
             = (m * (Succ (0 + n))) [plus-nat-def]
             = (m * (Succ n))       [plus-nat-def]
             = (m * m)              [hyp]])
\end{tcAthena}
